main event: Two or three large flashing lights were observed hovering and moving slowly across the sky near the Grand Rapids Air Force Station in Michigan.
interesting points: The objects stood still for approximately 10 minutes.
The objects slowly moved east and descended behind the trees.
The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes.
The objects were described as looking like two huge bright headlights revolving or blinking separately.
The sighting was reported by an anonymous witness from the 707th Squadron at the Grand Rapids Air Force Station.
sighted object: two or three large flashing lights
witnesses: anonymous witness from the 707th Squadron at the Grand Rapids Air Force Station
